alert.note: Alert for Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 6:12PM EDT until July 26 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Erie County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 611 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Conneaut, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Erie, Corry, North East, Girard, Waterford, Wattsburg, Northwest Harborcreek, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville, Lake City, Platea, McKean, Northwest Harborcr and Avonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
